# Ferrum Data Works

> AI-ready data infrastructure and Redis acceleration services

## About
Ferrum Data Works transforms legacy infrastructure into AI-ready, zero-latency data systems using Redis, in-memory databases, caching, vector search, and integrated AI pipelines.

## Services
- Financial Model Generation - Native .xlsx with working formulas
- Document Ingestion - PDF, scans, rent rolls to structured data
- Financial Math & Validation - Zero-hallucination arithmetic
- Writing Style Emulation - Match your firm's tone
- Research & Due Diligence - Automated data collection
- Institutional Memory (RAG) - Search across years of documents
- Agent Orchestration - Multi-step AI workflows
- On-Prem & Air-Gapped - Local LLM deployment
- Real-Time Data Pipelines - CDC and event sourcing

## Target Industries
- Private Equity & VC
- Commercial Real Estate
- Financial Services
- Enterprise Legacy Systems
